p: Lipid peroxidation was detected by the determination of MDA content as described by the method of Buege and Aust [ 17] with a slight modification. MDA levels were determined by using an extinction coefficient for MDA-TBA complex of 1.56 10 5 M − 1 cm − 1 and expressed as nmol/mg protein. Hydrogen peroxide content in both reproductive-organs was performed according to Dingeon et al. [ 18] and the results were expressed as μmol of H 2O 2 per mg of protein.
